title: What are the best K-pop albums from each generation (1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, I would love to answer it, but at the same time, man I haven’t heard any 1st generation songs or albums, so I’m not gonna include them! Also I will give one girl group and one boy group album, so enjoy~ 2nd Generation Best Album: Boy Group MADE - BigBang Girl Group Hush - Miss A 3rd Generation Best Album: Boy Group The Most Beautiful Moment in Life: Young Forever/ You Never Walk Alone/ Love Yourself: Her/ Skool Luv Affair - BTS (I’m sorry can’t decide from these cause I equally love all of them and I highkey wanna add more but I won’t!!)    Girl Group Page Two/ Summer Nights/ Merry and Happy/ Feel Special - Twice (can’t decide from them too!!)    4th Generation Best Album: Boy Group I AM WHO/ I AM YOU/ Cle: Lavanter - Stray Kids (again can’t decide!!)   (Special mention: HELLEVATOR!!) or The Dream Chapter: Magic/ The Dream Chapter: Eternity/ The Dream Chapter: Star - Tomorrow by Together (yess, I can’t decide again!!)   Girl Group It’z ME/ Not Shy - Itzy (lol you know what I’ll say 😂)  (Actually, I don’t listen to albums of so many groups. These are the groups I frequently listen to, like their albums/ b-sides. It’s only my opinion, no need to agree with it!)

I do not know much about 1st generation albums so I’ll go from 2nd generation-present. 2nd Gen: Infinitize by Infinite  The album with the best K-pop song in history! 3rd Gen: Gol-cha! by Golden Child  The worst styling era for Golden Child, but a great debut album with such a good title track! 4th Gen: Running Toogether by Too  After their debut album, Too came with this banger with Step by Step, the perfect song!
